sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog max-width="500px">
        <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="text-h5 text-center">
                비밀번호 변경하기
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
                <v-form @submit.prevent="resetPassword">
                    <v-text-field
                        label="email"
                        v-model="email"
                        type="email"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-email"
                        required
                    >
                    </v-text-field>
    
                    <v-text-field
                        label="기존 비밀번호"
                        v-model="asIsPassword"
                        type="password"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-lock"
                        required
                    > 
                    </v-text-field>

                    <v-text-field
                        label="신규 비밀번호"
                        v-model="toBePassword"
                        type="password"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-lock"
                        required
                    > 
                    </v-text-field>

                    <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" block>비밀번호 재설정 요청</v-btn>
                    <v-btn color="red" @click="closeModal" block>닫기</v-btn>
                </v-form>
            </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
    
</template>

<script>
export default{
    data(){
        return{
            email:"",
            asIsPassword:"",
            toBePassword:"",

        }
    },
    methods:{
        async resetPassword(){
            // password 재설정
            // member/reset-password
            try{
                await axios.patch(`${process.env.VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL}/member/reset-password`)
            }catch(e){
                console.log(e);
                alert(e.response)
            }
            

        },
        closeModal(){
            // closeModal을 누르는 순간 LoginPage에 false 전달
            // this.emit은 vue에서 컴포넌트 간의 이벤트를 전달하는 매커니즘
            // 자식컴포넌트에서 this.$emit을 호출하면 update:dialog라는 이벤트가 실행되고, false 부모 컴포넌트로 전달
            this.$emit('update:dialog',false)
        }
    }
}
</script>
